author: CTO at MidSize Inc.
text: We're looking to scale our AI-driven operations. Hiring now, and open to automation partners.
message:
Hi there! I saw your recent tweet:
 "We're looking to scale our AI-driven operations. Hiring now, and open to automation partners...."

We noticed you're looking into AI or automation. We help teams integrate AI-human collaboration systems to scale operations and reduce expert bottlenecks.Happy to share a quick demo or talk if you're open!
